package raindrops

import "strconv"

const (
	PLACEHOLDER_1	= "Pling"
	PLACEHOLDER_2	= "Plang"
	PLACEHOLDER_3	= "Plong"
)

var PLACEHOLDER_4 = []struct {
	PLACEHOLDER_5	int
	PLACEHOLDER_6	string
}{{PLACEHOLDER_5: 3, PLACEHOLDER_6: PLACEHOLDER_1}, {PLACEHOLDER_5: 5, PLACEHOLDER_6: PLACEHOLDER_2}, {PLACEHOLDER_5: 7, PLACEHOLDER_6: PLACEHOLDER_3}}

func PLACEHOLDER_7(PLACEHOLDER_8 int) string {
	var PLACEHOLDER_9 string
	for _, PLACEHOLDER_10 := range PLACEHOLDER_4 {
		if PLACEHOLDER_8%PLACEHOLDER_10.PLACEHOLDER_5 == 0 {
			PLACEHOLDER_9 += PLACEHOLDER_10.PLACEHOLDER_6
		}
	}
	if PLACEHOLDER_9 == "" {
		PLACEHOLDER_9 = strconv.Itoa(PLACEHOLDER_8)
	}
	return PLACEHOLDER_9
}
